name: Blobitronica
description:
This game is born during the Ludum dare #34. The theme was "Growing"

The player grows exponentially as he eats, in an ever-growing hostile environment.

Eat the tasty looking balls, while avoiding contact with traps, missiles ... and LASER BEAMS !

TWO DIFFERENT MODES:
- Classic (which is good for starting)
- GoFast (which is more nervous and challenging)

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER:
The game can be played with a friend in local mode. Cooperate with him, or push him into traps, your choice !

CONTROLS:
Player one - arrows key
Player two - WASD (or QWSD for our friendly azerty keyboard users).

TIPS:
Don't be afraid of traps much smaller than you ;)

FIXES:
-Joystick controller enabled
-Balanced ennemies so they start spawning later in the game rather than right at the start.
-Fixed a little camera issue when playing in "Go fast" mode.

Have fun :)
